args.content:
import Mathlib

variable {n : â„•}

/-- The linear map A : â„ â†’ (Fin n â†’ â„) given by A x = x â€¢ a. -/
def linear_of_vec (a : Fin n â†’ â„) : â„ â†’â‚—[â„] (Fin n â†’ â„) :=
  LinearMap.mk
    (AddMonoidHom.mk (fun x : â„ => x â€¢ a) (by intros; simp [smul_add]))
    (by intros m x; simp [mul_smul])

/-- The corresponding continuous linear map. -/
def A (a : Fin n â†’ â„) : â„ â†’L[â„] (Fin n â†’ â„) :=
  ContinuousLinearMap.mk (linear_of_vec a)

/-- Operator norm of A equals the Euclidean norm of a. -/
theorem opNorm_of_smul_vec (a : Fin n â†’ â„) : â€–A aâ€– = â€–aâ€– := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {n : â„•}

/-- The linear map A : â„ â†’ (Fin n â†’ â„) given by A x = x â€¢ a. -/
def linear_of_vec (a : Fin n â†’ â„) : â„ â†’â‚—[â„] (Fin n â†’ â„) :=
  LinearMap.mk
    (AddHom.mk (fun x : â„ => x â€¢ a) (by intros x y; simp [smul_add]))
    (by intros m x; simp [mul_smul])

/-- The corresponding continuous linear map. -/
def A (a : Fin n â†’ â„) : â„ â†’L[â„] (Fin n â†’ â„) :=
  ContinuousLinearMap.mk (linear_of_vec a) (by continuity)

/-- Operator norm of A equals the Euclidean norm of a. -/
theorem opNorm_of_smul_vec (a : Fin n â†’ â„) : â€–A aâ€– = â€–aâ€– := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {n : â„•}

/-- The linear map A : â„ â†’ (Fin n â†’ â„) given by A x = x â€¢ a. -/
def linear_of_vec (a : Fin n â†’ â„) : â„ â†’â‚—[â„] (Fin n â†’ â„) :=
  LinearMap.mk
    (AddMonoidHom.mk (fun x : â„ => x â€¢ a) (by intros x y; simp))
    (by intros m x; simp)

/-- The corresponding continuous linear map. -/
def A (a : Fin n â†’ â„) : â„ â†’L[â„] (Fin n â†’ â„) :=
  ContinuousLinearMap.mk (linear_of_vec a) (by continuity)

/-- Operator norm of A equals the Euclidean norm of a. -/
theorem opNorm_of_smul_vec (a : Fin n â†’ â„) : â€–A aâ€– = â€–aâ€– := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {n : â„•}

/-- The linear map A : â„ â†’ (Fin n â†’ â„) given by A x = x â€¢ a. -/
def linear_of_vec (a : Fin n â†’ â„) : â„ â†’â‚—[â„] (Fin n â†’ â„) :=
  LinearMap.mk
    ((AddMonoidHom.mk (fun x : â„ => x â€¢ a) (by intros x y; simp)) : â„ â†’+ (Fin n â†’ â„))
    (by intros m x; simp)

/-- The corresponding continuous linear map. -/
def A (a : Fin n â†’ â„) : â„ â†’L[â„] (Fin n â†’ â„) :=
  ContinuousLinearMap.mk (linear_of_vec a) (by continuity)

/-- Operator norm of A equals the Euclidean norm of a. -/
theorem opNorm_of_smul_vec (a : Fin n â†’ â„) : â€–A aâ€– = â€–aâ€– := by sorry
